attributes.action: Cancel 2021 A-Level and GCSE exams. Give students predicted grades from teachers
attributes.additional_details:
As students have missed months worth of school, trying to catch up and revise everything on their curriculum will cause more stress and anxiety than ever before. especially since this generation suffer with alot of mental health issues already.
Allow teachers to give honest predicted grades as they did for the 2020 exams. Save students the stress and anxiety as they dont have the same circumstances that other years and students (in Scotland) have.
attributes.background: Let teachers give students predicted grades for GCSE and A-Level 2021 and cancel exams as they have done for the 2020 students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Ensure all 2021 examinations are based on teacher assessment only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549147

Triple Lock for 2021 A Levels Exam Results: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548555
